fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Target a player, You deal a powerful astral attack
- During the day, target someone, you will appear to visit them instead of who you would normally visit tonight. (3 uses)
- Control a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, the host chooses a neutral player, and you choose a player, they are now sacrificial pawns.
- Any negative effects that happen to you at night are instead directed to one of your sacrificial pawns unless you say that no abilities will be redirected before night ends.
- You are informed of all abilities that were redirected off of you to a sacrificial pawn.
- You have the ability to multitask.
- You do not know your sacrificial pawns.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: NK goal. Sacrificial pawns also win with you. You also win if a neutral sacrificial pawn wins.
